title-group.article-title: Asset Opaqueness and Split Bond Ratings

abstract.p: We examine the relation between asset opaqueness and split ratings. We find that firms with asset opaqueness problems are more likely to receive split bond ratings from Moody's and S&P rating agencies. Our results suggest that there is a causal link between asset opaqueness and split ratings.
